name: Quilted Cup and Bowl Set (Amber)
description:
This is a handmade, wheel thrown bowl and cup set . It is made from cone 6 stoneware and fired in an electric kiln at Mullox Studios in Minneapolis, MN. It was created just for you by Eric Mullis of Mullox Studios. Thanks for taking a look and enjoy.

This item will be made on order. Please allow for a two week delivery time. Because these are hand made pots there may be slight variations from the item in the picture.

Eric Mullis & Kelly Cox

name: Farm Plate with Goat
description:
These farm plates are handmade and hand-painted by me. They are one of a kind and not only do they stack nicely one on top of the other but they are food and dishwasher safe. Because they were low fired on terracotta clay they used less energy in their production and therefor are more environmentally friendly than other dinnerware. I hope that you enjoy using them as much as I enjoyed making them!
-Kelly Cox

Dimensions:
10"x10"

name: Quilted Mug
description:
This is a handmade, wheel thrown mug. It is made from cone 6 stoneware and fired in an electric kiln at Mullox Studios in Minneapolis, MN. This mug is generously sized and great for warm winter drinks. It was created just for you by Eric Mullis of Mullox Studios. Thanks for taking a look and enjoy.

This item will be made on order. Please allow for a two week delivery time. Because these are hand made pots there may be slight variations from the item in the picture.

Eric Mullis & Kelly Cox

Dimensions 3.75 inches x 5.25 inches
Volume 2.5 cups
Microwave safe
Dishwasher safe

name: Quilted Coffee Pot
description:
This is a handmade, wheel thrown Coffee Pot. It is made from cone 6 stoneware and fired in an electric kiln at Mullox Studios in Minneapolis, MN. This is elegant and practical with a good straight pour. It was created just for you by Eric Mullis of Mullox Studios. Thanks for taking a look and enjoy.

This item will be made on order. Please allow for a two week delivery time. Because these are hand made pots there may be slight variations from the item in the picture.

Eric Mullis & Kelly Cox
